column5: This week only..  Jiffy Power Augers 25% off ! (Reg $499.99 to $549.99 for $374.99 to $412.49)  Floater coats 79-1977x M to XXL 25% OFF (REG 199.99 for $149.99)  20% off ice fishing gear in general  20% off all Coleman heaters.
I picked up a decent 1/4 and 3/8 drive socket set there today for $20.00. Great for around the house. And guaranteed for life.
Those floater coats were on a few weeks back for $99.99 and they seem like a great jacket. I was told they were clearing out that particular model.

CTC has alot of good sales and you can get some great stuff there.  Couple weeks back I picked up a set of pliers/cutters for $10....reg. $40  Their not the best tools on the market, but like Dan says, their great for around the house and you can't beat their warranty.
Auger what ice is their LOL no wonder they are on sale.
